data.eml:eml: Description of two new Lophocampa Harris from the Dominican Republic (Arctiidae, Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vincent, Benoit (2011): Description of two new Lophocampa Harris from the Dominican Republic (Arctiidae, Arctiinae). ZooKeys 75: 69-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.75.811, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.75.811
